channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 書類送検：裁判官は、押収した機材を取り戻し、家宅捜索につながったFBI宣誓供述書の開示を求めたジャーナリストのティモシー・バークの要求を却下した（Matthew Keys/The Desk）。
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Filing: a judge denies journalist Timothy Burke's request to get back his seized equipment and to have unsealed an FBI affidavit that led to his home's search  —  Additionally, a judge has refused to unseal an FBI affidavit that was filed with an application for a search warrant earlier this year.

item.title: メディア・マターズがXの白人ナショナリストのアカウントに掲載されたNFLの広告を発見した後、NFLは「問題を理解し、是正するためにXに懸念を表明した」と述べている（Drew Richardson/CNBC）
item.description:
Drew Richardson / CNBC:
After Media Matters found NFL ads placed on white nationalist accounts on X, the NFL says it “expressed our concerns to X to understand and rectify the issue”  —  - The National Football league responded to a report that its ads appeared on white nationalist X accounts.

item.title: 米国、英国、ドイツの110人へのインタビューによると、若年層と高齢層では、ネットニュースの適正価格の基準点が異なる可能性がある（Laura Hazard Owen/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Laura Hazard Owen / Nieman Lab:
Interviews with 110 people in the US, UK, and Germany show that younger and older people may have different reference points for the right price of online news  —  A few years back, German publisher Spiegel decided to try something new: A cheaper Spiegel+ digital subscription just for readers under 30.

item.title: グーグルは、パブリッシャーがrobots.txtフラグを使用することで、自社のデータをAIモデルの学習に使用することを拒否できるようにしている。
item.description:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
Google lets publishers use a robots.txt flag to opt out of the company using their data to train its AI models, while remaining accessible through Google Search  —  Google just announced it's giving website publishers a way to opt out of having their data used to train the company's AI models …

item.title: ガネットは、テイラー・スウィフトとビヨンセを取材する2つの仕事に、エミー賞受賞のジャーナリストやTikTokのインフルエンサーを含む約1000人の応募を受けた（ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Gannett received nearly 1,000 applications for two jobs, covering Taylor Swift and Beyoncé, including from Emmy-award-winning journalists and TikTok influencers  —  USA Today parent Gannett is sifting through responses from Emmy-award-winning journalists, TikTok influencers …

item.title: Varietyがツイートで行ったように、アートやエンターテインメントを表現するのに「コンテンツ」を使うことは、多くの職業を1つに平坦化し、クリエイターの仕事を意図的に最小化する（Jason Bailey/New York Times）
item.description:
Jason Bailey / New York Times:
Using “content” to describe art and entertainment, as Variety did in a tweet, flattens many professions into one and purposefully minimizes creators' work  —  The term may be popular in an age of blurring lines between platforms, but the Hollywood strikes have shown how the phrase can devalue creative work.

item.title: Foxテレビ局が、AIを使って地元や地域の広告主のCM制作を支援するWaymarkと契約、WaymarkはGray、Spectrumなどと協力（Brian Steinberg/Variety）
item.description:
Brian Steinberg / Variety:
Fox TV Stations signs a deal with Waymark, which uses AI to help local and regional advertisers make commercials; Waymark works with Gray, Spectrum, and others  —  Fox TV Stations wants to help even the smallest local advertiser make an appearance on TV.

item.title: ブランド、ミュージシャン、クリエイターがNFTを含む「デジフィジカル体験」を構築できるようにするニューヨークのIYKは、A16z Cryptoが率いる1680万ドルのシードを調達した（Yogita Khatri/The Block）。
item.description:
Yogita Khatri / The Block:
NYC-based IYK, which lets brands, musicians, and creators build “digi-physical experiences”, including through NFTs, raised a $16.8M seed led by A16z Crypto  —  - IYK has raised $16.8 million in seed funding led by A16z Crypto.  — The startup helps brands …

item.title: Mediumは、クレジット、報酬、同意に関する譲歩を得られるまで、AI企業がMediumで公開された記事でトレーニングすることをブロックする計画だ（Tony Stubblebine/The Medium Blog）
item.description:
Tony Stubblebine / The Medium Blog:
Medium plans to block AI companies from training on posts published on Medium until the company can get concessions regarding credit, compensation, and consent  —  Fair use in the age of AI: Credit, compensation and consent are required.  —  ·  —  ·  —  Just now

item.title: 音楽ライセンス・マーケットプレイスのSongtradrがBandcampを買収、アーティストファーストの収益シェアでマーケットプレイス兼コミュニティとしてBandcampの運営を継続予定（Songtradr）
item.description:
Songtradr:
Music licensing marketplace Songtradr acquires Bandcamp and plans to keep operating Bandcamp as a marketplace and community with an artist-first revenue share  —  (September 28 - Los Angeles) - Songtradr, a music licensing platform and marketplace company supporting artists, labels and publishers …

item.title: Epic Games、従業員の16％にあたる約830人をレイオフ、音楽ストアのBandcampから撤退、"キッズテック "企業SuperAwesomeをスピンオフする意向（Ash Parrish/The Verge）
item.description:
Ash Parrish / The Verge:
Epic Games lays off 16% of its workforce, or ~830 employees, divests from music storefront Bandcamp, and intends to spin off “kid-tech” company SuperAwesome  —  Bloomberg reports that Fortnite developer Epic Games is expected to lay off 16 percent of its workforce.

item.title: Spotify、パートナーと業務を分担するSpotify CTV Partner Networkの一環として、Rokuを皮切りにCTVアプリ向けの動画広告を開始（Parker Herren/Ad Age）
item.description:
Parker Herren / Ad Age:
Spotify launches video ads for its CTV apps, beginning with Roku, as part of its upcoming Spotify CTV Partner Network that will share duties with its partners  —  Music streamer partnered with Roku to launch video ads on its CTV apps  —  How to realize the full potential of converged TV advertising

item.title: フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙によると、2022年の英国の営業利益は前年比179％増の1,340万ポンド、売上高は前年比14％増の4億2,250万ポンド、ウェブと新聞の購読者数は前年比9％増の126万人以上となった（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
The Financial Times reports 2022 UK operating profit up 179% YoY to £13.4M, revenue up 14% YoY to £422.5M, and web and newspaper subscribers up 9% YoY to 1.26M+  —  Globally the FT Group grew revenues by 5% in 2022 according to unaudited accounts.

item.title: 今週のGBニュース事件を受けて、DMGメディアはMailOnlineのフリーランス・コラムを休止していたダン・ウートンとの契約を解除した（Jim Waterson/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Jim Waterson / The Guardian:
In response to this week's GB News events, DMG Media terminates its contract with Dan Wootton, whose MailOnline freelance column had already been paused  —  Journalist's column and contract terminated after comments made by Laurence Fox on his GB News show  —  Dan Wootton has been sacked …

item.title: Reddit、Redditのアクティビティに基づく広告パーソナライゼーションをオプトアウトする機能を削除。
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Reddit removes the ability to opt out of ad personalization based on Reddit activity but says that users will still have opt-out controls in “select countries”  —  Reddit said Wednesday that the platform is revamping its privacy settings with an aim to make ad personalization and account visibility toggles consistent.
